00062 TopoDS_Shape
00063 MakeBottle(const Standard_Real myWidth , const Standard_Real myHeight ,
00064                    const Standard_Real myThickness)
00065 {
00066         //Profile : Define Support Points
00067         gp_Pnt aPnt1(-myWidth / 2. , 0 , 0);
00068     gp_Pnt aPnt2(-myWidth / 2. , -myThickness / 4. , 0);
00069     gp_Pnt aPnt3(0 , -myThickness / 2. , 0);
00070     gp_Pnt aPnt4(myWidth / 2. , -myThickness / 4. , 0);
00071     gp_Pnt aPnt5(myWidth / 2. , 0 , 0);
00072 
00073         //Profile : Define the Geometry
00074         Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) aArcOfCircle = GC_MakeArcOfCircle(aPnt2,aPnt3 ,aPnt4);
00075     Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) aSegment1    = GC_MakeSegment(aPnt1 , aPnt2);
00076     Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) aSegment2    = GC_MakeSegment(aPnt4 , aPnt5);
00077 
00078         //Profile : Define the Topology
00079         TopoDS_Edge aEdge1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(aSegment1);
00080         TopoDS_Edge aEdge2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(aArcOfCircle);
00081     TopoDS_Edge aEdge3 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(aSegment2);
00082         TopoDS_Wire aWire  = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire(aEdge1 , aEdge2 , aEdge3);
00083 
00084         //Complete Profile
00085         gp_Ax1 xAxis = gp::OX();
00086         gp_Trsf aTrsf;
00087 
00088     aTrsf.SetMirror(xAxis);
00089 
00090         BRepBuilderAPI_Transform aBRepTrsf(aWire , aTrsf);
00091         TopoDS_Shape aMirroredShape = aBRepTrsf.Shape();
00092         TopoDS_Wire aMirroredWire = TopoDS::Wire(aMirroredShape);
00093 
00094         BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire mkWire;
00095 
00096     mkWire.Add(aWire);
00097     mkWire.Add(aMirroredWire);
00098 
00099     TopoDS_Wire myWireProfile = mkWire.Wire();
00100 
00101         //Body : Prism the Profile
00102         TopoDS_Face myFaceProfile = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeFace(myWireProfile);
00103         gp_Vec          aPrismVec(0 , 0 , myHeight);
00104 
00105         TopoDS_Shape myBody = BRepPrimAPI_MakePrism(myFaceProfile , aPrismVec);
00106 
00107         //Body : Apply Fillets
00108         BRepFilletAPI_MakeFillet mkFillet(myBody);
00109         TopExp_Explorer                  aEdgeExplorer(myBody , TopAbs_EDGE);
00110 
00111         while(aEdgeExplorer.More()){
00112                 
00113                 TopoDS_Edge aEdge = TopoDS::Edge(aEdgeExplorer.Current());
00114 
00115         //Add edge to fillet algorithm
00116                 mkFillet.Add(myThickness / 12. , aEdge);
00117 
00118         aEdgeExplorer.Next();
00119         }
00120 
00121         myBody = mkFillet.Shape();
00122 
00123         //Body : Add the Neck   
00124         gp_Pnt neckLocation(0 , 0 , myHeight);
00125         gp_Dir neckNormal = gp::DZ();
00126     gp_Ax2 neckAx2(neckLocation , neckNormal);
00127 
00128         Standard_Real myNeckRadius = myThickness / 4.;
00129         Standard_Real myNeckHeight = myHeight / 10;
00130 
00131         BRepPrimAPI_MakeCylinder MKCylinder(neckAx2 , myNeckRadius , myNeckHeight);
00132         TopoDS_Shape myNeck = MKCylinder.Shape();
00133 
00134         myBody = BRepAlgoAPI_Fuse(myBody , myNeck);
00135 
00136         //Body : Create a Hollowed Solid
00137         TopoDS_Face   faceToRemove;
00138         Standard_Real zMax = -1;
00139 
00140         for(TopExp_Explorer aFaceExplorer(myBody , TopAbs_FACE) ; aFaceExplorer.More() ; aFaceExplorer.Next()){
00141                 
00142                 TopoDS_Face aFace = TopoDS::Face(aFaceExplorer.Current());
00143 
00144         //Check if <aFace> is the top face of the bottle's neck
00145                 Handle(Geom_Surface) aSurface = BRep_Tool::Surface(aFace);
00146 
00147                 if(aSurface->DynamicType() == STANDARD_TYPE(Geom_Plane)){
00148 
00149                         Handle(Geom_Plane) aPlane = Handle(Geom_Plane)::DownCast(aSurface);
00150 
00151                         gp_Pnt            aPnt = aPlane->Location();
00152                         Standard_Real aZ   = aPnt.Z();
00153                         
00154                         if(aZ > zMax){
00155                                 
00156                                 zMax             = aZ;
00157                 faceToRemove = aFace;
00158                         }
00159                 }
00160         }
00161 
00162         TopTools_ListOfShape facesToRemove;
00163         
00164         facesToRemove.Append(faceToRemove);
00165 
00166         myBody = BRepOffsetAPI_MakeThickSolid(myBody , facesToRemove , -myThickness / 50 , 1.e-3);
00167 
00168 
00169         //return myBody;
00170         //Threading : Create Surfaces
00171         Handle(Geom_CylindricalSurface) aCyl1 = new Geom_CylindricalSurface(neckAx2 , myNeckRadius * 0.99);
00172         Handle(Geom_CylindricalSurface) aCyl2 = new Geom_CylindricalSurface(neckAx2 , myNeckRadius * 1.05);
00173 
00174         //Threading : Define 2D Curves
00175         gp_Pnt2d aPnt(2. * PI , myNeckHeight / 2.);
00176     gp_Dir2d aDir(2. * PI , myNeckHeight / 4.);
00177     gp_Ax2d aAx2d(aPnt , aDir);
00178 
00179         Standard_Real aMajor = 2. * PI;
00180     Standard_Real aMinor = myNeckHeight / 10;
00181 
00182     Handle(Geom2d_Ellipse) anEllipse1 = new Geom2d_Ellipse(aAx2d , aMajor , aMinor);
00183     Handle(Geom2d_Ellipse) anEllipse2 = new Geom2d_Ellipse(aAx2d , aMajor , aMinor / 4);
00184 
00185         Handle(Geom2d_TrimmedCurve) aArc1 = new Geom2d_TrimmedCurve(anEllipse1 , 0 , PI);
00186         Handle(Geom2d_TrimmedCurve) aArc2 = new Geom2d_TrimmedCurve(anEllipse2 , 0 , PI);
00187 
00188         gp_Pnt2d anEllipsePnt1 = anEllipse1->Value(0);
00189         gp_Pnt2d anEllipsePnt2 = anEllipse1->Value(PI);
00190         
00191         Handle(Geom2d_TrimmedCurve) aSegment = GCE2d_MakeSegment(anEllipsePnt1 , anEllipsePnt2);
00192 
00193         //Threading : Build Edges and Wires
00194         TopoDS_Edge aEdge1OnSurf1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(aArc1 , aCyl1);
00195         TopoDS_Edge aEdge2OnSurf1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(aSegment , aCyl1);
00196         TopoDS_Edge aEdge1OnSurf2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(aArc2 , aCyl2);
00197         TopoDS_Edge aEdge2OnSurf2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(aSegment , aCyl2);
00198 
00199         TopoDS_Wire threadingWire1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire(aEdge1OnSurf1 , aEdge2OnSurf1);
00200         TopoDS_Wire threadingWire2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire(aEdge1OnSurf2 , aEdge2OnSurf2);
00201 
00202         BRepLib::BuildCurves3d(threadingWire1);
00203         BRepLib::BuildCurves3d(threadingWire2);
00204 
00205         //Create Threading
00206         BRepOffsetAPI_ThruSections aTool(Standard_True);
00207         
00208         aTool.AddWire(threadingWire1);
00209         aTool.AddWire(threadingWire2);
00210         aTool.CheckCompatibility(Standard_False);
00211 
00212         TopoDS_Shape myThreading = aTool.Shape();
00213 
00214         //Building the resulting compound
00215         TopoDS_Compound aRes;
00216         BRep_Builder aBuilder;
00217         aBuilder.MakeCompound (aRes);
00218 
00219         aBuilder.Add (aRes, myBody);
00220         aBuilder.Add (aRes, myThreading);
00221 
00222         return aRes;
00223 }
00224 
00225 void LoadBottle ( Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext theContext )
00226 {
00227         TopoDS_Shape aBottle=MakeBottle(50,70,30);
00228 
00229     Handle(AIS_Shape) AISBottle=new AIS_Shape(aBottle);
00230     theContext->SetMaterial(AISBottle,Graphic3d_NOM_GOLD);
00231     theContext->SetColor(AISBottle, Quantity_NOC_RED);
00232     theContext->SetDisplayMode(AISBottle,1,Standard_False);
00233     theContext->Display(AISBottle, Standard_False);
00234         //theContext->SetCurrentObject(AISBottle, Standard_False);
00235 
00236 }

00238 
00239 void AddVertex (double x, double y, double z, Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext theContext)
00240 {
00241         TopoDS_Vertex aVertex=BRepBuilderAPI_MakeVertex( gp_Pnt(x,y,z) );
00242         Handle(AIS_Shape) AISVertex = new AIS_Shape(aVertex);
00243         // context is the handle to an AIS_InteractiveContext object.
00244         theContext->Display(AISVertex); 
00245 }
00246 
00247 void ShowOrigin ( Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext theContext )
00248 {
00249         AddVertex ( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, theContext); 
00250 }
